org.modelio.gproject.model.importer.core

Class AbstractImporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.model.importer.core.AbstractImporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultImporter

    public abstract class AbstractImporter
extends Object
    Base class for model import or copy service classes.

        Run the copy/import operation
        Parameters:
        localSession - the destination session
        localRoot - the destination root element
        refSession - the source modeling session
        refRoots - the elements to copy/import
        Returns:
        the result of the import operation

      • fixRoots

        protected void fixRoots(ICoreSession localSession,
            SmObjectImpl localRoot,
            List<SmObjectImpl> refRoots)
        Post process imported roots composition relation.

        Should ensure that all imported roots have a composition owner.
        This method should look for orphan elements then call reparentElements(Map, ICoreSession, SmObjectImpl).

        Parameters:
        localSession - the target session
        localRoot - the target element
        refRoots - the imported roots in the source model.

      • reparentElements

        protected abstract void reparentElements(Map<SmObjectImpl,SmDependency> toReparent,
                    ICoreSession localSession,
                    SmObjectImpl localRoot)
        Called by fixRoots(ICoreSession, SmObjectImpl, List).

        Change the composition owner of the map keys to the given parent, using the map values as dependency.

        Parameters:
        toReparent - the map of elements to reparent in the target local model
        localSession - the target local session
        localRoot - the target root destination element where roots should be reparented to.

      • fixElements

        protected final void fixElements(ICoreSession localSession,
               ICoreSession refSession)
        Fix all imported elements.

        Either repair or delete broken elements.

        Parameters:
        localSession - the target model session
        refSession - the source model session

      • fixElement

        protected abstract void fixElement(SmObjectImpl localObject,
              SmObjectImpl refObject,
              ICoreSession localSession,
              ICoreSession refSession)
        Fix the given element if broken.
        Parameters:
        localObject - the target model object to fix
        refObject - the source model object
        localSession - the target model session
        refSession - the source model session

      • collectGarbage

        protected final void collectGarbage()
        Iterates ~garbaged~ elements, Finds the orphan elements that are not root elements, then schedule them for deletion.

      • deleteGarbage

        protected void deleteGarbage()
        Delete objects scheduled for deletion.

      • isRoot

        public static boolean isRoot(SmObjectImpl obj)
        Test whether the given model object is a composition root.
        Parameters:
        obj - a model object
        Returns:
        true only if it is a composition root.

      • execute

        public final IImportReport execute(ICoreSession localSession,
                    List<SmObjectImpl> localRootList,
                    ICoreSession refSession,
                    List<List<SmObjectImpl>> refRootsList)
        Run a copy/import operation on multiple roots at the same time.

        Parameters:
        localSession - the destination session
        localRootList - the destination root elements
        refSession - the source modeling session
        refRootsList - the elements to copy/import
        Returns:
        the result of the import operation
